author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

Fix clang warnings in FastSimulation/SimplifiedGeometryPropagator: use CMS_THREAD_GUARD (reusing std::once_flag) and remove unused [this] from lambda expression in plugin NuclearInteractionFTF.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, workflow 2018.8 runs.
title: Fix clang warnings in FastSimulation/SimplifiedGeometryPropagator
